name.baseName: cement production|cement, ordinary portland cement, 42.5MPa|new dry process, 4000 t-cl/d|mixed solid wastes
水泥生产|水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥, 42.5MPa|新型干法, 4000 t-cl/d|混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Precalciner kiln dry process cement production is a typical representative of new dry process. The process flow of new dry process cement production line of precalciner kiln with a daily production capacity of 4000t clinker in China. Limestone from the mine is transported into the crusher feed bib by the dump truck. crushed by crusher and crusher, sent to the crushed stone storage, and then sent to the pre-homogenization yard by skirt plate feeder and belt conveyor in a quantitative manner. Clay is imported by dump truck or unloaded from the clay pile shed of the plant into the clay feed bin by bucket, fed by feeder into the double-roll crusher for crushing, and sent to the pre-batch homogenization yard by metering equipment. The limestone and clay are automatically combined in the pre-batching homogenizing yard and homogenized into a uniform mixed raw material. The mixed raw materials, limestone and iron powder are sent to the feeding bin of the grinding head of the raw mill from the yard by belt conveyor, and then sent to the drying mill for drying and grinding by quantitative unloading and feeding. The hot gas for the drying mill comes from the exhaust gas discharged from the suspension preheater, and the hot air is supplied with the help of the hot air furnace during start-up. The powdered raw meal after grinding is lifted by a pneumatic pump and sent to two continuous air homogenization silos for further air mixing and storage. The raw material in the homogenizing storage is discharged, measured, lifted and fed into the suspension preheater and decomposer at the kiln tail by the pneumatic pump, and then preheated and decomposed. After that, it enters the rotary kiln for calcination to produce clinker. The raw coal used in the rotary kiln and decomposition furnace is dried and ground to make coal powder and stored in the coal powder bin for supply. The clinker is cooled by castor cooler and then sent to the clinker storage by skirt conveyor, metering scale and bucket elevator respectively. The clinker and gypsum are fed into the cement mill for grinding by a metering device. The cement mill with powder selector constitutes a so-called ring-flow cement mill, which can also be ground with the appropriate amount of mixed materials and clinker and gypsum according to the product requirements. After grinding, the cement is sent to the cement warehouse by the silo air transfer pump for storage. Part of the cement is packaged in bags by the packaging machine and transported out of the factory by train or truck, while the other part is shipped in bulk by bulk special vehicle.

预分解窑干法水泥生产是新型干法的典型代表。我国日产4000t熟料的预分解窑新型干法水泥生产线的工艺流程。 来自矿山的石灰石由自卸卡车运入破碎机喂料仓，经破碎机和破碎机破碎，送入碎石库内存储，然后由裙板式喂料机、皮带输送机定量送往预均化堆场。粘土用自卸卡车输入或从工厂的粘土堆棚中用铲斗卸入粘土喂料仓，经喂料机喂入双辊破碎机破碎，经计量设备送入预配料的预均化堆场。石灰石和粘土在预配料均化堆场自动配合，并均化成均匀的混合原料。混合原料、石灰石及铁粉各自从堆场由皮带输送机送往生料磨的磨头喂料仓，经定量卸料、喂料送入烘干磨进行烘干与粉磨。烘干磨的热气体来自悬浮预热器排出的废气，启动时则借助热风炉供热风。 粉磨后的生料用气力提升泵送入两个连续性空气均化库进一步用空气搅拌均化生料和储存生料。均化库中的生料经卸料、计量、提升、定量喂入后由气力提升泵送至窑尾悬浮预热器和分解炉经预热和分解后的物料进入回转窑煅烧成熟料。回转窑和分解炉所用原煤经烘干兼粉磨后制成的煤粉并存储在煤粉仓中供给。熟料经蓖式冷却机冷却后由裙板输送机、计量称、斗式提升机分别送入熟料库中存储。 熟料、石膏经定量喂料机喂料送入水泥磨中粉磨。水泥磨带有选粉机构成所谓的圈流水泥磨粉磨时也可根据产品要求加入适量的混合材料和熟料、石膏一同粉磨。粉磨后的水泥经仓式空气输送泵送至水泥库中存储一部分水泥经包装机包装为袋装水泥用火车或卡车运输出厂另一部分由散装专用车散装出厂。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Taking the usage performance of cement with a compressive strength of 42.5 MPa at 28 days per 1 kg as the functional unit, that is IFu=42.5 kgMPa. The research scope is defined as: raw material pretreatment, raw material grinding, clinker calcination, clinker grinding, cement homogenization, and cement storage.
以1千克28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的水泥所具有的使用性能为功能单位，即IFu=42.5kgMPa。 研究范围界定为：原料预处理一生料粉磨一生料煅烧一熟料粉磨一水泥均化一水泥储存。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 曹晓润. (2005). 低环境负荷型水泥的生态环境评价 [硕士, 武汉理工大学].

石灰石
Gupsum
石膏
Fly ash
粉煤灰
The original document is labeled as "slag" (i.e. blast furnace slag).
原文献是矿渣（即高炉矿渣）
Standard coal. The original data is 0.0938kg standard coal, here converted to hard coal, the conversion formula is 1kg hard coal = 0.929kg standard coal.
标准煤。原始数据为0.0938kg标准煤，这里换算为硬煤，换算公式为1kg硬煤=0.929kg标准煤。
Electricity
电力
Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter.
粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。

Sulfur dioxide. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
二氧化硫。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。

Nitrogen oxides. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
氮氧化物。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。

Carbon dioxide. Considering the actual operating conditions of domestic cement plants and the development trend for the foreseeable future, the statistical average of measured data is adopted for this evaluation.
二氧化碳。考虑到国内水泥厂运行的实际情况和未来很长时间的发展趋势，本次评价采用实测数据的统计平均值。
